macros.xml:
pRESTO tools in galaxy do not support the following common command-line options:
- Inputs must be FASTQ format and cannot be FASTA format. - Multiple inputs are not supported per argument, i.e. - Steps that take a pair of fastq inputs can only take two files, not two sets of files - Steps that take a single set of fastq inputs can only take a single file - The ``--outdir`` and ``--outname`` options are not supported; output files are named directly
